verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Take out the trash,
Remove the debris from me.
Wash me down and clean me up,
And make me what You want me to be.
I know it might hurt
When You remove all the dirt from me;
But, whatever it takes, take out the trash in me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The devil's dust, my soul began to rust.
it put a lot of strain on me.
But Jesus' love is like suds from above,
He washed me completely clean.
